segments.text: I see the kitchen layout clearly, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on that task, ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Because the sink is overflowing massively right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down, forming a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in it, but shows no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are piled on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the boy's climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting backâ€” that's so dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open wide, framing the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path and bushes look inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic chaos hidden from the peaceful view is ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR
